casebody.data:
VYAS
v.
CARRIAGE PARK LTD., et al. No. 513A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2004. Mark A. Finkelstein, Raleigh, for Vyas.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of December 2004 by Defendants for extension of time to file brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendants shall have up to and including the 22nd day of December 2004 to file and serve their brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of December 2004."
